meanings.definition: Covered with densely matted woolly hairs.
meanings.sent1: The teddy bear had a tomentous appearance due to its fluffy coat.
meanings.sent2: The sheep's tomentous fleece kept it warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The tomentous puppy looked like a walking cloud.
meanings.sent4: The tomentous clouds in the sky resembled giant cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The tomentous caterpillar was almost camouflaged against the tree bark.

meanings.sent1: The tomentous edges of the painting gave it a dreamy quality.
meanings.sent2: The tomentous figure in the mist seemed like a ghostly apparition.
meanings.sent3: The tomentous shadow on the wall looked like a blurry monster.
meanings.sent4: The tomentous memories of childhood felt like distant dreams.
meanings.sent5: The tomentous outline of the mountain faded into the horizon.
